content:
Hello,
Is there a sign-up sheet for the Care Coordination track? We're probably only going to shadow/observe, and focus on loading up the track artifacts; but we also have the Gravity Screen App server available. If we're going to turn those servers on and upload questionnaire artifacts, might as well start implementing Care Coordination as well.

Name: Abigail Watson
Organization: Symptomatic, LLC
Zulip: @Abigail Watson
Role: Screening App
BaseURL: https://gravity.symptomatic.io/baseR4
Notes: Focusing on the Structured Data Capture IG. Testing Gravity, In-Person Pre-Arrival Notional Workflow, and Care Coordination questionnaires.
@Abigail Watson there is a kickoff meeting at the top of the hour.
I don't see the meeting info on the track page.

Hi @Abigail Watson here is our track page: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2020-09+Care+Coordination+Track and here is our sign up sheet: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2020-09+Care+Coordination+Track+Participation+Sign+Up
@Abigail Watson if you interested in working with Gravity here is their track page https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2020-09+Gravity+SDOH-CC+Track. Contact their track Lead Bob Dieterle
